who am i: we appear to be a man who is stuck in the cave
where is the cave: the cave is in arizona, the state we live in
am i the who: no. we are not, in fact, a member of the who
who is reginald: he was the hammond organ player at our retirement party. we had to fire him.
why did i fire reginald: his playing was beautiful. it was too beautiful to ruin by association with that day.
